experiences.description:
* Product Management:
- Responsible for inventory management,
- Responsible for the rotation of goods from the sub-warehouse as well as from other stores to ensure there are enough goods, sizes, colors for sale and display.
- Implement measures to prevent and minimize the theft of goods from outside and inside.
- Implement and manage subordinate employees to comply with all regulations on display of goods of the company.
- Check ranking list daily and weekly
- Provide employees with information and seasonal fashion trends.
- Make sure your inventory is organized in order (ref / size / color).
- Preserving goods in the best condition
- Make other product reports as required from product management (PRoduct Manager) or from store chain management (Operation Manager).
* Manage brand image:
- Ensure the stores are always clean, arranged in accordance with standards and display as prescribed during the opening time.
- Check and supplement necessary items for sales to the store
- Check, monitor staff display and replace windows weekly according to the instructions of the company.
- Regularly conduct market exploration and report back to management.
- Regularly checking and requesting related departments to perform defect within the time allowed.
